Package gamemechanics

Class Board

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
gamemechanics.Board
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventListener, javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent>
public class Board extends javafx.application.Application implements javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent>
The main GUI application for the game. Holds the enemies, rewards and main character, as well as displays the visuals, and handles the input. Displays timers and score of the player. Dispatches methods to allow different objects to interact.
